title: Bills of exchange and promissory notes
content: 34. A bill of exchange or promissory note shall be deemed to have been made, accepted or endorsed on behalf of a company if made, accepted or endorsed in the name of, or by or on behalf of, or on account of, the company by any person acting under its authority. Documents to be signed on the basis of express or implied authorization. 4 of 99(I) of 2009.
